title: GPT-OSS 120B Runs at 3000 tokens/sec on Cerebras
summary:
This article announces the availability of OpenAI's GPT OSS 120B, a powerful open-weight reasoning model, on Cerebras systems. The key takeaway is that Cerebras offers significantly faster performance compared to GPU-based solutions.

GPT OSS 120B, a 120 billion parameter model, rivals OpenAI's o4-mini in accuracy on reasoning benchmarks and excels in tasks like coding, math, and health-related queries. Its open-weight nature allows for transparency and fine-tuning flexibility.

Cerebras boasts up to 3,000 tokens per second inference speeds, reportedly 15x faster than leading GPU clouds. They also claim a time to first token of just 280 milliseconds, with output speed of 2,700 tokens/s. This speed makes it suitable for agentic and coding applications where rapid response times are crucial.

Moreover, Cerebras claims equal-first accuracy in the AIME 2025 math evaluation and offers a strong price-performance advantage, delivering 16x the speed of the median GPU cloud for less than twice the cost. The model is available on the Cerebras Inference Cloud and through partners like HuggingFace, OpenRouter, and Vercel.
chinese_title: GPT-OSS 120B 在 Cerebras 上运行速度达 3000 tokens/秒
chinese_summary:
本文宣布OpenAI的GPT OSS 120B（一款强大的开放权重推理模型）在Cerebras系统上可用。主要结论是，Cerebras提供的性能明显快于基于GPU的解决方案。

GPT OSS 120B是一个拥有1200亿参数的模型，在推理基准测试中，其准确性可与OpenAI的o4-mini相媲美，并在编码、数学和健康相关查询等任务中表现出色。其开放权重的特性使其具有透明性和微调灵活性。

据称，Cerebras拥有高达每秒3,000个token的推理速度，比领先的GPU云快15倍。他们还声称首个token的时间仅为280毫秒，输出速度为2,700个token/秒。这种速度使其适用于需要快速响应时间的代理和编码应用程序。

此外，Cerebras声称在AIME 2025数学评估中并列第一，并具有强大的性价比优势，以不到两倍的成本提供中位数GPU云16倍的速度。该模型可在Cerebras推理云上以及通过HuggingFace、OpenRouter和Vercel等合作伙伴获得。

title: Understanding traffic
summary:
This article delves into the complexities of traffic congestion, explaining that simply adding more lanes isn't a viable solution. It differentiates between road speed and throughput, highlighting that traffic jams significantly reduce throughput. The author emphasizes that cars are inefficient at transporting people due to space constraints and reaction time requirements, leading to limited lane capacity. Bottlenecks, often at intersections, are major culprits, and fixing one bottleneck merely exposes the next.

The article introduces the concept of "marginal drivers," those who are willing to endure traffic, thus setting the overall congestion level. It also discusses "latent demand," referring to people who avoid driving due to traffic and would drive if conditions improved. This highlights the phenomenon of induced demand, where improved road conditions attract more drivers, potentially negating the benefits of expansion.

The author also points out that through traffic contributes significantly to congestion and that routes compete with each other, sometimes causing counterintuitive situations like Braess's Paradox, where removing a road can actually improve flow.

The author advocates for attractive alternatives to driving, such as better and more frequent transit with seamless connections to other modes. They also suggest prioritizing transit in traffic, providing safe bike routes with parking, and supporting the use of e-bikes. Addressing minor inconveniences that discourage non-car modes can also contribute to reducing traffic.

Finally, the article touches on the inadequacy of current bicycling networks, particularly for those using cargo bikes or trailers, and how infrastructure needs to be designed with a broader vision to encourage more people to choose cycling.
chinese_title: 理解交通
chinese_summary:
本文深入探讨了交通拥堵的复杂性，指出简单增加车道并非可行的解决方案。文章区分了道路速度和通行能力，强调交通堵塞会显著降低通行能力。作者强调，由于空间限制和反应时间要求，汽车在运送人员方面效率低下，导致车道容量有限。瓶颈，尤其是交叉路口，是主要原因，而解决一个瓶颈只会暴露下一个。

文章介绍了“边际驾驶者”的概念，即那些愿意忍受交通拥堵的人，从而决定了整体拥堵程度。文章还讨论了“潜在需求”，指的是那些因交通拥堵而避免开车的人，如果交通状况改善，他们就会开车。这突出了诱导需求现象，即改善的道路状况会吸引更多的驾驶者，从而可能抵消扩建带来的好处。

作者还指出，过境交通是造成拥堵的重要原因，并且路线之间相互竞争，有时会导致违反直觉的情况，例如布雷斯悖论，即移除一条道路实际上可以改善交通流量。

作者提倡具有吸引力的替代驾驶方案，例如更好、更频繁的公交，并与其他交通方式无缝衔接。他们还建议在交通中优先考虑公交，提供安全的自行车道和停车场，并支持使用电动自行车。解决那些阻碍非汽车出行方式的小问题也有助于减少交通。

最后，文章还谈到了当前自行车网络的不完善，特别是对于那些使用货运自行车或拖车的人来说，以及基础设施需要以更广阔的视野进行设计，以鼓励更多的人选择骑自行车。

title: A Fond Farewell
summary:
The Farmers' Almanac has announced that its 2026 edition will be its last, marking the end of a 200+ year publication run. In a farewell message, editors Sandi Duncan and Peter Geiger express gratitude to their loyal readers, contributors, and partners. They acknowledge the Almanac's long-standing presence in many families, where it was used for everything from planting guides based on Moon phases to determining the "Best Days" for various activities.

While the Almanac will no longer be available in print or online after December 2025, the editors encourage readers to keep its spirit alive by passing down its wisdom and traditions. They suggest sharing Almanac-inspired knowledge, like planting peas when daffodils bloom or interpreting a red sky at night, to future generations.

Copies of the final 2026 edition are available for purchase on FarmersAlmanac.com, Amazon.com, and at select local stores. Members are advised to check their inboxes for subscription information.
chinese_title: 依依惜别
chinese_summary:
《农民年鉴》宣布2026年版将是最后一版，标志着超过200年出版历程的结束。在告别信中，编辑桑迪·邓肯和彼得·盖格向他们忠实的读者、贡献者和合作伙伴表示感谢。他们承认年鉴在许多家庭中长期存在，人们利用它做各种事情，从根据月相制定的种植指南到确定各种活动的“最佳日子”。

虽然年鉴在2025年12月之后将不再提供印刷版或在线版本，但编辑们鼓励读者通过传承其智慧和传统来保持其精神的延续。他们建议将年鉴启发下的知识，如水仙花开时种植豌豆或解读夜晚红色的天空，分享给后代。

最后一版2026年版可在FarmersAlmanac.com、Amazon.com和部分当地商店购买。会员请查看收件箱以获取订阅信息。

title: Text case changes the size of QR codes
summary:
This article explains how the case of text used to generate a QR code impacts its size. When generating QR codes, the algorithm interprets mixed-case text as binary data (ISO/IEC 8859-1), requiring 8 bits per character. However, if the text is entirely uppercase and within the QR code's alphanumeric character set (45 characters), it is encoded using a more efficient alphanumeric mode, encoding two characters in 11 bits (5.5 bits per character).

This more efficient encoding means that uppercase text generates smaller QR codes because it requires fewer bits to represent the same information. The example given demonstrates a reduction from a 33x33 pixel grid to a 29x29 pixel grid when converting text to uppercase before creating the QR code.

The article then applies this principle to Bitcoin addresses. Bech32 encoding, which uses a 32-character monocase alphabet, although requiring more characters than Base58 encoding (58 characters), ultimately results in smaller QR codes because of the monocase nature and the efficiency of alphanumeric encoding after being converted to uppercase. Therefore Bech32 encoding needs fewer QR code pixels to represent the same data as Base58 encoding.
chinese_title: 文本大小写改变二维码尺寸
chinese_summary:
本文解释了用于生成二维码的文本的大小写如何影响二维码的大小。生成二维码时，算法将大小写混合的文本解释为二进制数据（ISO/IEC 8859-1），每个字符需要 8 位。但是，如果文本完全是大写字母，并且位于二维码的字母数字字符集（45 个字符）内，则会使用更高效的字母数字模式进行编码，即用 11 位编码两个字符（每个字符 5.5 位）。

这种更高效的编码意味着大写文本生成较小的二维码，因为它需要更少的位来表示相同的信息。给出的示例演示了在创建二维码之前将文本转换为大写时，从 33x33 像素网格减少到 29x29 像素网格。

然后，本文将此原理应用于比特币地址。Bech32 编码使用 32 个字符的单字母表，虽然比 Base58 编码（58 个字符）需要更多字符，但由于单字母表的性质以及转换为大写后字母数字编码的效率，最终会产生更小的二维码。因此，Bech32 编码需要更少的二维码像素来表示与 Base58 编码相同的数据。

title: Why LTO-10 fell short on speed and backward compatibility
summary:
This article analyzes why LTO-10 tape, while increasing capacity, failed to improve I/O speed and lost backward compatibility with LTO-9. LTO-9 uses linear serpentine recording, shingling, and servo bands for precise head positioning. Capacity increases traditionally come from wider/longer tapes, narrower tracks, or smaller bit areas, while I/O improvements come from faster tape speeds and more read-write head elements.

LTO-10 maintained the 400 MBps native data rate due to physical limitations of the tape material's thickness, preventing faster speeds without risking damage. Linear density (bit length) also couldn't be easily improved, so capacity gains came from drastically increasing track density.

While a 64-track read-write head (potentially doubling I/O to 1,000 MBps) is technically feasible, it presents a significant engineering challenge due to the massive increase in cables required.

The decision to forgo backward compatibility was driven by two major factors. First, clients usually skip generations and would be migrating from LTO-7/8 to LTO-10. Second, LTO-10 uses a different servo format with 36° angles to increase head assembly positioning resolution. This change, alongside improved tape dimensional stability, media initialization, and the introduction of head tilt-following control to handle the increased track density, made backward compatibility unachievable. Essentially, the pursuit of higher track density necessitated significant changes to the servo system and head positioning mechanisms, sacrificing compatibility for performance potential.
chinese_title: LTO-10为何在速度和向后兼容性方面表现不佳
chinese_summary:
本文分析了LTO-10磁带在增加容量的同时，未能提高I/O速度并丧失与LTO-9向后兼容性的原因。LTO-9采用线性蛇形记录、叠瓦式记录和伺服带进行精确磁头定位。容量的增加传统上来自更宽/更长的磁带、更窄的磁道或更小的位区域，而I/O的改进则来自更快的磁带速度和更多的读写磁头元件。

LTO-10保持了400 MBps的原始数据速率，因为磁带材料的厚度存在物理限制，无法在不冒损坏风险的情况下提高速度。线性密度（位长度）也难以轻松提高，因此容量的增加主要来自大幅提高磁道密度。

虽然技术上可行使用64磁道读写头（可能将I/O提高到1,000 MBps），但这提出了巨大的工程挑战，因为所需的电缆数量将大幅增加。

放弃向后兼容性的决定主要由两个因素驱动。首先，客户通常会跳过几代产品，直接从LTO-7/8迁移到LTO-10。其次，LTO-10使用不同的伺服格式，采用36°角来提高磁头组件的定位分辨率。这种改变，加上改进的磁带尺寸稳定性、介质初始化以及引入的磁头倾斜跟踪控制，以处理增加的磁道密度，使得向后兼容性无法实现。本质上，对更高磁道密度的追求迫使伺服系统和磁头定位机制发生重大变化，牺牲了兼容性以换取性能潜力。

title: 1973 implementation of Wordle was published by DEC (2022)
summary:
This article traces the origins of Wordle-like games back to a 1973 BASIC program called WORD, published by Digital Equipment Corp. (DEC). Unlike the 1955 game Jotto, WORD provided clues about letter placement, similar to Wordle. Written by Charles Reid, WORD was included in the popular book *BASIC Computer Games*.

The article then broadens its scope to explore the history of guessing games in early computing, highlighting GUESS, a FOCAL program that inspired many others. These games, often simple enough for early computers with limited memory, involved a computer concealing information which the player had to deduce. Other examples include HI-LO, NUMBER, STARS, TRAP, BAGELS, and HURKLE, all described with their unique mechanics.

The article also touches on combat-themed guessing games like TARGET, Bombardment, Depth Charge, and Salvo, and explores the more complex reverse-guessing games, where the computer tries to guess what the human is thinking. Examples include ANIMAL, SALVO, DIGITS, and NICOMA.

Ultimately, the article emphasizes the rich history of guessing games in early computing, highlighting the simplicity and ingenuity that allowed these games to thrive even with limited technological resources. The article also offers links to play these classic games in a browser, suggesting the potential for rediscovering and rejuvenating these games for a modern audience.
chinese_title: 1973年Wordle的实现由DEC于2022年发布。
chinese_summary:
本文追溯了类Wordle游戏的历史渊源，将其追溯到1973年数字设备公司（DEC）发布的BASIC程序WORD。与1955年的游戏Jotto不同，WORD提供了字母位置的提示，与Wordle类似。WORD由查尔斯·里德编写，收录在畅销书《BASIC电脑游戏》中。

然后，本文扩大了范围，探索了早期计算机中猜谜游戏的历史，重点介绍了启发了许多其他游戏的FOCAL程序GUESS。这些游戏通常足够简单，可以在早期内存有限的计算机上运行，包括计算机隐藏信息，玩家必须推断出来。其他例子包括HI-LO、NUMBER、STARS、TRAP、BAGELS和HURKLE，并描述了它们独特的机制。

本文还涉及以战斗为主题的猜谜游戏，如TARGET、Bombardment、Depth Charge和Salvo，并探讨了更复杂的反向猜谜游戏，即计算机试图猜测人类的想法。例子包括ANIMAL、SALVO、DIGITS和NICOMA。

最终，本文强调了早期计算机猜谜游戏丰富多彩的历史，突出了其简单性和独创性，使得这些游戏即使在技术资源有限的情况下也能蓬勃发展。本文还提供了在浏览器中玩这些经典游戏的链接，表明了重新发现和振兴这些游戏以吸引现代观众的潜力。

title: Why I love my Boox Palma e-reader
summary:
This blog post details the author's love for their Boox Palma e-reader and why it has become their preferred reading device over their Kindle Paperwhite. The author emphasizes their rediscovery of reading as a hobby and their appreciation for e-ink technology, citing features like backlight, font consistency, contrast in sunlight, and portability as key benefits.

While the author still uses their Kindle, they highlight several issues that led them to seek an alternative. These include the Kindle's size making it less portable, Amazon's restrictive book ownership policies, difficulty importing non-Amazon books, and the annoyance of pervasive ads.

The Boox Palma, purchased used, addresses these issues. Its small size and lightweight design make it easily pocketable and comfortable to hold. The full Android operating system allows for access to any reading app, freeing the user from the Amazon ecosystem. The screen quality is comparable to or better than the Kindle, and customizable lock screen wallpapers add a personal touch. Furthermore, the absence of built-in internet encourages focused reading. The inclusion of physical page-turn buttons is a bonus.

The author compares the Boox Palma to their Kindle, discusses their preferred TPU case, and shares pictures of the device in use. In conclusion, the author recommends the Boox Palma for those who value extreme portability and a distraction-free reading experience. They express a minor desire for a custom ROM to improve the Android software.
chinese_title: 我为什么喜欢我的Boox Palma电子阅读器
chinese_summary:
这篇博文详细描述了作者对文石Palma电子阅读器的喜爱，以及它如何取代Kindle Paperwhite成为作者首选的阅读设备。作者强调了自己重新发现阅读这一爱好，并赞赏电子墨水技术，列举了背光、字体一致性、阳光下的对比度和便携性等关键优点。

虽然作者仍然使用Kindle，但他们也指出了导致他们寻找替代方案的几个问题。这些问题包括Kindle的尺寸使其便携性降低、亚马逊限制性的图书所有权政策、导入非亚马逊图书的困难，以及无处不在的广告带来的烦恼。

二手购买的文石Palma解决了这些问题。它小巧的尺寸和轻巧的设计使其易于放入口袋且握持舒适。完整的Android操作系统允许访问任何阅读应用程序，从而使用户摆脱了亚马逊的生态系统。屏幕质量与Kindle相当或更好，可自定义的锁屏壁纸增添了个性化色彩。此外，缺乏内置互联网鼓励了专注阅读。物理翻页按钮的加入是一项额外的好处。

作者将文石Palma与他们的Kindle进行了比较，讨论了他们首选的TPU保护套，并分享了设备的使用照片。总之，作者推荐文石Palma给那些重视极致便携性和无干扰阅读体验的人。他们表达了希望有一个自定义ROM来改进Android软件的小小愿望。

title: Research first to show humans have remote touch "seventh sense" like sandpipers
summary:
Researchers at Queen Mary University of London and University College London have discovered that humans possess a "remote touch" sense, similar to that used by shorebirds like sandpipers to detect buried prey. This is the first documented instance of this sense in humans.

The study involved participants using their fingers to locate a hidden cube in sand without direct contact. The results showed that humans can detect the presence of buried objects by perceiving minute displacements in the sand, approaching the theoretical limits of mechanical reflection detection.

A comparison between human and robotic performance revealed that humans achieved 70.7% precision in detecting objects within the expected range, while a robotic tactile sensor achieved 40% precision despite sensing objects from slightly farther distances.

The discovery expands the understanding of human touch perception and offers valuable insights for developing advanced robotic tactile sensing systems. This research highlights potential applications in fields such as archaeology and exploration of challenging terrains like Martian soil or ocean floors, improving safety and effectiveness in tasks where vision is limited.

The researchers emphasize the multidisciplinary nature of the study, highlighting the collaboration between psychology, robotics, and AI. Elisabetta Versace, from Queen Mary, notes that this changes our conception of human perception, while Zhengqi Chen discusses potential applications in assistive technologies and robotic tools. Lorenzo Jamone from UCL, highlights the synergy between the human and robotic studies, illustrating the power of multidisciplinary collaboration.
chinese_title: 研究表明人类可能拥有类似鹬鸟的远程触觉“第七感”
chinese_summary:
伦敦玛丽女王大学和伦敦大学学院的研究人员发现，人类拥有一种“远程触觉”，类似于鹬等滨鸟用来探测埋藏猎物的方式。这是人类首次被记录到拥有这种感觉。

这项研究涉及参与者在不直接接触的情况下，用手指在沙子中定位一个隐藏的立方体。结果表明，人类可以通过感知沙子中的微小位移来探测埋藏物体的存在，接近机械反射探测的理论极限。

人类和机器人性能的比较显示，在预期范围内，人类探测物体的精度达到70.7%，而机器人触觉传感器尽管从稍远的距离感知物体，但精度仅为40%。

这一发现扩展了对人类触觉认知的理解，并为开发先进的机器人触觉传感系统提供了宝贵的见解。这项研究突出了在考古学和探索火星土壤或海底等具有挑战性地形等领域的潜在应用，提高了在视觉受限任务中的安全性和效率。

研究人员强调了这项研究的多学科性质，突出了心理学、机器人学和人工智能之间的合作。玛丽女王大学的伊丽莎白塔·范思哲指出，这改变了我们对人类感知的概念，而郑启辰讨论了在辅助技术和机器人工具中的潜在应用。伦敦大学学院的洛伦佐·贾莫内强调了人类和机器人研究之间的协同作用，说明了多学科合作的力量。

title: My Experience of building Bytebeat player in Zig
summary:
This blog post details the author's experience building a bytebeat player called Zigbeat in Zig, a project undertaken during a break between jobs. Bytebeat is a form of algorithmic music generated from short programs using bitwise operations to produce 8-bit audio samples.

The author chose Zig for the project, appreciating its C-like feel without the complexities of borrow checkers and challenging syntax. The development process, which included setting up a Raylib-Zig project for both native and browser (wasm) compilation, provided valuable insights into Zig's memory management and string handling. A significant hurdle was optimizing performance, which was addressed by implementing an Arena Allocator to efficiently manage memory allocation for the AST (Abstract Syntax Tree) used in parsing bytebeat expressions. Initially, the author was allocating memory for the AST on every sample, which led to performance issues, especially in the browser.

The author aimed to create a retro 8-bit synth aesthetic, similar to older synthesizers with visualizers. Initial attempts using Raylib's primitive drawing API proved cumbersome, leading to exploration of sprite-based designs, but the author's lack of design experience posed a challenge.

The author concluded that choosing Zig over JavaScript was beneficial, leading to a deeper understanding of parsing and evaluation techniques like Pratt parsing and lexer mods. They express satisfaction with the learning experience and encourage readers to explore the Zigbeat project on GitHub.
chinese_title: 我用 Zig 构建 Bytebeat 播放器的经验
chinese_summary:
用 Zig 构建 Bytebeat 播放器 Zigbeat 的经验

这篇博文详细介绍了作者在工作间隙使用 Zig 语言构建名为 Zigbeat 的 bytebeat 播放器的经验。Bytebeat 是一种算法音乐形式，它通过使用位运算生成 8 位音频样本的短程序来产生音乐。

作者之所以选择 Zig 进行这个项目，是因为它具有类似 C 语言的风格，但没有借用检查器和复杂的语法。开发过程（包括为本机和浏览器 (wasm) 编译设置 Raylib-Zig 项目）提供了对 Zig 的内存管理和字符串处理的宝贵见解。一个重要的障碍是优化性能，这通过实现 Arena Allocator 来有效地管理 AST（抽象语法树）的内存分配来解决。最初，作者在每个样本上都为 AST 分配内存，这导致了性能问题，尤其是在浏览器中。

作者的目标是创造一种复古的 8 位合成器美学，类似于带有可视化器的旧合成器。最初使用 Raylib 的原始绘图 API 的尝试被证明很麻烦，导致探索基于精灵的设计，但作者缺乏设计经验带来了挑战。

作者得出结论，选择 Zig 而不是 JavaScript 是有益的，这导致了对 Pratt 解析和词法分析器修改等解析和评估技术的更深入理解。他们对学习经历表示满意，并鼓励读者在 GitHub 上探索 Zigbeat 项目。

title: WinObjC – The Windows Bridge for iOS
summary:
The Windows Bridge for iOS (WinObjC) is a Microsoft open-source project that allows developers to create Universal Windows Platform (UWP) apps from existing Objective-C iOS code. This enables code reuse and integration with Windows 10 features.

To use WinObjC, you need Windows 10 (build 10586 or higher) and Visual Studio 2017 with specific components selected during installation, including UWP development tools, .NET Mobile Development with Xamarin (due to Nugetizer Bug), and various SDKs and toolsets.

To import an Xcode project, install Chocolatey (a Windows package manager) and the `winobjc-tools` command-line tool using PowerShell with administrator privileges. Then, navigate to your Xcode project directory in PowerShell and run `vsimporter.exe` to generate a Visual Studio solution.

The WOCCatalog sample app in the bridge SDK is recommended for learning the bridge's features. Clone the repo, navigate to the WOCCatalog directory, open the solution in Visual Studio, set the WOCCatalog project as the startup project, and run the app.

Resources include a wiki, development roadmap, Windows Dev Center website, a quick start challenge, an FAQ, and a samples repo. Contributions are welcome through bug reports, code reviews, pull requests, and participation on Twitter and StackOverflow.

Advanced installation steps are provided for contributors who wish to build the bridge from source, including the need for Git LFS.

To use WinObjC, you need Windows 10 (build 10586 or higher) and Visual Studio 2017 with specific components selected during installation, including UWP development tools, .NET Mobile Development with Xamarin (due to Nugetizer Bug), and various SDKs and toolsets.

To import an Xcode project, install Chocolatey (a Windows package manager) and the `winobjc-tools` command-line tool using PowerShell with administrator privileges. Then, navigate to your Xcode project directory in PowerShell and run `vsimporter.exe` to generate a Visual Studio solution.

The WOCCatalog sample app in the bridge SDK is recommended for learning the bridge's features. Clone the repo, navigate to the WOCCatalog directory, open the solution in Visual Studio, set the WOCCatalog project as the startup project, and run the app.

title: Meta projected 10% of 2024 revenue came from scams
summary:
According to a Reuters report based on internal Meta documents, the company projected that 10% of its 2024 revenue, approximately $16 billion, would come from scam ads and sales of banned goods. These internal documents also revealed that Meta was aware of potential hefty fines for failing to curb this fraudulent activity. The company strategically prioritized enforcement efforts in regions with the strictest penalties, weighing the cost of lost revenue from cracking down on scams against potential regulatory fines.

While the documents indicated Meta aimed to reduce fraudulent behavior, cuts to its moderation team resulted in most user-reported violations being ignored or rejected. In response to the report, Meta spokesperson Andy Stone claimed the documents presented a "selective view" of internal enforcement and asserted that Meta actively combats fraud and scams. Despite Meta's claims, the report highlights the significant financial benefit the company derives from fraudulent ads and banned goods, raising questions about its commitment to effectively addressing the issue.
chinese_title: Meta预计2024年收入的10%来自诈骗。
chinese_summary:
根据路透社基于Meta内部文件的报道，该公司预计其2024年收入的10%，约160亿美元，将来自诈骗广告和违禁商品销售。这些内部文件还显示，Meta意识到因未能遏制这种欺诈行为而可能面临巨额罚款。该公司策略性地优先在处罚最严厉的地区开展执法工作，权衡打击诈骗带来的收入损失与潜在的监管罚款。

虽然这些文件表明Meta旨在减少欺诈行为，但对其审核团队的削减导致大多数用户举报的违规行为被忽视或驳回。针对该报道，Meta发言人安迪·斯通声称这些文件呈现了内部执法的“选择性视角”，并断言Meta积极打击欺诈和诈骗。尽管Meta提出了上述声明，该报告凸显了该公司从欺诈广告和违禁商品中获得的巨大利益，引发了人们对其有效解决这一问题的承诺的质疑。

title: A rats to riches story: Larry the Downing Street cat finds place in TV spotlight
summary:
Larry the cat, the Chief Mouser of the Cabinet Office at 10 Downing Street, is the subject of a new Channel 4 documentary celebrating Britain's love of cats. Having resided at No. 10 since 2011, Larry has outlasted five Prime Ministers and become a beloved symbol of stability amid political change.

Adopted from Battersea Dogs & Cats Home to address a rodent problem, Larry has become a fixture at Downing Street, charming world leaders like Barack Obama and Volodymyr Zelenskyy. He's known for his relaxed demeanor in front of cameras, his diplomatic appearances during official visits, and his ability to pose perfectly for photographers.

Despite his popularity, Larry has faced criticism, including accusations of being lazy and overfed. However, sources close to Larry maintain that he is not publicly funded, with Downing Street staff covering his costs.

His daily routine includes greeting guests, inspecting security, napping on antique furniture, and contemplating mouse control. While he's had rivals, like Palmerston from the Foreign Office, Larry's enduring appeal is undeniable, evidenced by a large social media following and fan mail from around the world. His presence at No. 10 provides continuity, nonpartisan appeal, and a touch of levity in the world of British politics.
chinese_title: A rats to riches story: Larry the Downing Street cat finds place in TV spotlight
chinese_summary:
住在唐宁街10号的内阁办公厅首席捕鼠官，猫咪拉里，是第四频道一部新纪录片的主题，该片旨在庆祝英国人对猫的喜爱。自2011年入住唐宁街10号以来，拉里已经经历了五位首相，并成为政治变革中备受欢迎的稳定象征。

拉里从巴特西猫狗之家被领养来解决鼠患问题，如今已成为唐宁街的常客，以其魅力征服了巴拉克·奥巴马和弗拉基米尔·泽连斯基等世界领导人。他以在镜头前的放松姿态、在正式访问期间的外交亮相以及完美地为摄影师摆姿势的能力而闻名。

尽管拉里很受欢迎，但他还是面临批评，包括被指责懒惰和过度喂养。然而，与拉里关系密切的消息人士坚称，他没有接受公共资金，唐宁街的工作人员承担了他的费用。

他的日常包括迎接客人、检查安保、在古董家具上小憩以及思考如何控制老鼠。虽然他有过竞争对手，比如来自外交部的帕默斯顿，但拉里持久的魅力是不可否认的，这体现在庞大的社交媒体粉丝群和来自世界各地的粉丝来信中。他在唐宁街10号的存在为英国政坛提供了连续性、无党派吸引力以及一丝轻松。

title: Using the Web Monetization API for fun and profit
summary:
This article discusses Web Monetization, a proposed standard that allows publishers to earn revenue directly from users in a pay-as-you-browse model. The author, who recently spoke at JSConf Mexico and interacted with the Interledger Foundation, encourages readers to try Web Monetization for themselves.

To get started, users need to install a Web Monetization extension, obtain a wallet (like GateHub, which supports EUR and USD), and connect the wallet to the extension. The transactions use fiat currency, despite the wallets often being used for crypto. When visiting a monetized site, the extension displays a green checkmark. Users can adjust the hourly payment rate and send one-time payments, with money streamed every minute.

Publishers can implement Web Monetization by adding a payment link with their personalized payment pointer (obtained from their wallet) to their website's code. This allows them to receive streamed and one-time payments.

The JavaScript API allows for dynamic content adjustments based on monetization events. Publishers can detect when a user is paying and, for example, remove ads, unlock content, or display thank you messages.

The author is optimistic about Web Monetization's potential to create a financially sustainable future for web publishers of all sizes. They encourage others to try it and share their experiences.
chinese_title: 使用Web Monetization API进行娱乐和盈利
chinese_summary:
本文探讨了Web Monetization，一项允许发布者通过“按浏览付费”模式直接从用户处获得收入的拟议标准。作者最近在JSConf Mexico上发表了演讲，并与Interledger Foundation进行了互动，他鼓励读者亲自尝试Web Monetization。

要开始使用，用户需要安装Web Monetization扩展程序，获取一个钱包（如支持欧元和美元的GateHub），并将钱包连接到扩展程序。 尽管这些钱包通常用于加密货币，但交易使用法定货币。 访问已货币化的网站时，扩展程序会显示一个绿色复选标记。 用户可以调整每小时的付款费率并发送一次性付款，资金每分钟都会进行流式传输。

发布者可以通过将包含其个性化付款指针（从其钱包获得）的付款链接添加到其网站代码中来实现Web Monetization。 这使他们能够接收流式传输和一次性付款。

JavaScript API允许基于货币化事件进行动态内容调整。 发布者可以检测到用户何时在付款，例如，删除广告、解锁内容或显示感谢消息。

作者对Web Monetization在为各种规模的网络发布者创造财务可持续的未来方面的潜力持乐观态度。 他鼓励其他人尝试它并分享他们的经验。

title: Why Sam Altman Won't Be on the Hook for OpenAI's Spending Spree
summary:
This InnovationDaily article examines the implications of OpenAI's massive $1.4 trillion commitment to datacenter deals with tech giants, questioning how the company, with projected $20 billion annual revenue, can possibly afford it. While CFO Sarah Friar initially hinted at government support, Altman clarified that the market, not the government, would handle any failures.

Analysts estimate OpenAI would need a 2900% revenue jump by 2029 to meet its obligations. However, scenarios like renegotiated contracts, usage-based billing, and potential supplier delays offer OpenAI escape routes. The contracts often have "capital I ifs." A key point is that CEO Sam Altman seemingly bears no personal financial risk, as he claims to have no stake in the company, even after restructuring. Experts criticize this lack of accountability, arguing he benefits from the upside without the downside.

The article explores potential outcomes, including increased fundraising, an IPO for easier debt raising, or even a fire sale acquisition by a company like Microsoft or Oracle in a bankruptcy scenario. In case of bankruptcy, debtholders like JPMorgan and other banks would be paid first, followed by equity investors, with Microsoft (owning 27%) likely prioritized. Common shareholders, including employees and the nonprofit, would be last in line.

Despite the potential financial strain, Altman prioritizes securing ample compute power, viewing it as crucial for AI development and revenue growth. Ultimately, the article suggests that Altman's audacious spending spree is a calculated gamble, relying on exponential revenue growth, renegotiations, or even bailouts from partners who benefit from their association with OpenAI.
chinese_title: 为什么山姆·奥特曼不会为OpenAI的消费狂潮负责
chinese_summary: OpenAI豪掷1.4万亿美元豪赌数据中心，谁来买单？

title: Washington Post among breach victims in Oracle EBS zero-day attacks
summary:
The Washington Post was among the victims of recent attacks exploiting a zero-day vulnerability in Oracle E-Business Suite (EBS). Cybersecurity firm Onapsis disclosed that a sophisticated threat actor, likely financially motivated, has been actively targeting organizations using outdated and unpatched Oracle EBS systems to gain unauthorized access, steal sensitive data, and potentially disrupt operations. The vulnerability, identified as impacting several Oracle EBS versions, allowed attackers to bypass authentication and execute arbitrary code.

The attackers are believed to have been exploiting the flaw for at least two years prior to the public disclosure, indicating a prolonged period of undetected activity. The attacks are characterized by their precision and sophistication, suggesting the threat actor possesses significant knowledge of Oracle EBS architecture. Onapsis noted that the attacks involved deploying webshells to maintain persistent access to compromised systems.

While Oracle had released patches for the vulnerability, many organizations, including The Washington Post, were apparently slow to apply them, leaving them exposed. The incident underscores the critical importance of timely patching and proactive security measures for enterprise resource planning (ERP) systems like Oracle EBS, which often hold highly sensitive business data. The article emphasizes the need for organizations to prioritize security updates and regularly monitor their systems for signs of compromise to mitigate the risk of such attacks.
chinese_title: 华盛顿邮报成为Oracle EBS零日攻击的受害者之一
chinese_summary:
《华盛顿邮报》成为利用Oracle电子商务套件(EBS)零日漏洞攻击的受害者之一。网络安全公司Onapsis披露，一个老练的威胁行为者（可能出于经济动机）一直在积极攻击使用过时且未打补丁的Oracle EBS系统，以获取未经授权的访问权限、窃取敏感数据并可能中断运营。该漏洞被确定影响多个Oracle EBS版本，允许攻击者绕过身份验证并执行任意代码。

据信，攻击者在公开披露前至少两年就开始利用该漏洞，表明存在一段长时间的未被发现的活动。这些攻击的特点是精确性和复杂性，表明威胁行为者对Oracle EBS架构有深入的了解。Onapsis指出，这些攻击涉及部署webshell以维持对受损系统的持久访问。

虽然Oracle已经发布了该漏洞的补丁，但包括《华盛顿邮报》在内的许多组织显然未能及时应用这些补丁，使其暴露在外。该事件突显了及时打补丁和主动安全措施对于像Oracle EBS这样的企业资源规划(ERP)系统至关重要，这些系统通常包含高度敏感的业务数据。这篇文章强调，各组织需要优先考虑安全更新，并定期监控其系统是否存在被入侵的迹象，以降低此类攻击的风险。
